survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users on their experience with digital banking services, focusing on usability, features, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use digital banking services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use digital banking services?

questions.question_text: Which digital banking features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes (MULTI_CHOICE) to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which digital banking features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of navigating your digital banking app or website?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of navigating your digital banking app or website?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your digital banking experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your digital banking experience?

questions.question_text: Have you encountered any technical issues while using digital banking services in the past 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge technical issues.

script.question_text: Have you encountered any technical issues while using digital banking services in the past 6 months?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issue(s) you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended follow-up to Q5 to capture details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: text box (OPEN_TEXT). Routing logic dependent on Q5.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issue(s) you encountered.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your digital banking service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question to measure loyalty.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your digital banking service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: Which device do you primarily use for digital banking?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional text (SINGLE_CHOICE).

script.question_text: Which device do you primarily use for digital banking?

questions.question_text: How important is biometric authentication (e.g., fingerprint, facial recognition) for your digital banking security?
questions.client_notes: 5-point scale to measure perceived importance of biometrics.

script.question_text: How important is biometric authentication (e.g., fingerprint, facial recognition) for your digital banking security?

questions.question_text: Do you use any third-party financial management apps (e.g., Mint, YNAB) alongside your digital banking service?
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Not sure' option for clarity.

script.question_text: Do you use any third-party financial management apps (e.g., Mint, YNAB) alongside your digital banking service?
